title: Franco Colapinto to replace Jack Doohan at Alpine — confirmed
summary: After months of speculation, Jack Doohan has lost his F1 seat at Alpine to Franco Colapinto — but will it only be a temporary change?

qa_pairs.question: Which driver has been confirmed to replace Jack Doohan at Alpine?
What team did Jack Doohan lose his seat at in Formula 1?
What is the nature of Franco Colapinto's replacement of Jack Doohan at Alpine?
